Sample E-mail Submission Form Written in AngularJS with Foundation 5 Front-End Framework

What does it do? Enter a blank or improperly formatted E-mail address and it will display its respective error message. Submitting a valid E-mail address will allow you to continue successfully.

Upon successful submission, a mock backend call is made and a cookie will be set. It is recommended that you open this site in Google Chrome incognito mode or something similar.

{{ errorMessage }}

E-mail Successfully Submitted!

A cookie has now been created on your machine, which prevents the initial screen from re-appearing. In order to bypass this, you will need to clear the cookie for this site.

Response by using $httpBackend (also visble in JS console): {{ successfulResponse }}
